projects.name: Smart Home Automation
projects.description: A comprehensive IoT system for home automation using ESP32 and various sensors.
projects.notes: This project demonstrates a basic smart home setup with temperature monitoring and appliance control.

projects.name: Plant Monitoring System
projects.description: Monitor soil moisture, light, and temperature for your plants with automatic watering system.
projects.notes: This system helps monitor plant health and automate watering based on soil conditions.

projects.name: Air Quality Monitor
projects.description: Track indoor air quality with this ESP8266-based system that measures PM2.5, CO2, temperature, and humidity.
projects.notes: This project helps monitor indoor air quality to maintain a healthy living environment.

projects.name: Smart Irrigation Controller
projects.description: Automate your garden irrigation with weather forecast integration and soil moisture sensing.
projects.notes: This system optimizes water usage by only irrigating when necessary based on soil conditions and weather forecasts.

projects.name: Private Project Example
projects.description: This is a private project that only the owner can see.
projects.notes: This is just a test project that is set to private.

instructions.usage: This file contains seed data for projects. You can use it with the MongoDB shell or import it using mongoimport.
instructions.mongoShell: Load this in MongoDB shell after replacing placeholder IDs with actual ObjectIds
instructions.nodeJs: In Node.js, parse this file and replace placeholder IDs with actual ObjectIds from your database
